A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not a bad movie as far as bad movies go. As for my expectations of this film\, i was greatly dissapointed by the end credits. it abruptly shut the door on the previous story and it sabotaged the luke skywalker character. in the force awakend i was extremely interested in these new characters. in the last jedi they could have died and would have been cool. I just did not care. this movie did not sell itself well enough.
